entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Port dotnet/sdk SourceBuild patches from dotnet/installer #22281
  • Nuget package with multiple content tfm:s doesn't work with package reference #22280
  • .Net SDK 6.0 RC2 has incorrect editor config files for AnalysisLevel 5 #22276
  • Cannot update dotnet workload maui on mac #22267
  • Communicate plans with the community about the future of .NET debugging and feedback loops (Removal of dotnet watch?) #22265
  • Fail to setup 5.0.403 arm64 SDK(November update) on win-arm64 with error this product not support on arm64 #22261
  • .NET 6 RC 2 PublishReadyToRun=true causes TypeLoadException at MethodInfo.GetCustomAttributes(bool) in certain conditions #22258

PullRequests

Created

  • Switch the non-windows test builds to also run helix and non-helix in parallel. #22284
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'main' #22279
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Improve loading of Roslyn assemblies on validate package task #22277
    Area-Compatibility
  • Revert "Remove Hot Reload support from dotnet watch (#22217)" #22262

Merged

  • Revive skipped / scoped tests #21181
    Area-AspNetCore

Updated

  • [ASP.NET Core] Updates the license headers for Razor files #20699
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Update the target framework for the test projects #22233
    Area-Infrastructure
